subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James was splendid and occasionally dominant, and he hardly needed to exert himself in a game that was never close as the Cleveland Cavaliers dismantled the retooled Knicks.
snippet: LeBron James was splendid and occasionally dominant, and he hardly needed to exert himself in a game that was never close as the Cleveland Cavaliers dismantled the retooled Knicks.
